channel.title: MYB

item.title: The problem with ‘very’

item.title: Edge Computing And AI: The New Backbone Of Smart Retail Operations
item.description: As retail evolves, edge computing and AI are rapidly becoming the backbone of smart, efficient and customer-focused operations.

item.title: The Future Of .IO Domains: Critical Insights For Tech Leaders
item.description: In this article, I explore the potential scenarios for .io's future, the risks for domain owners and why a solid domain strategy is crucial.

item.description: Big players are looking at the pros and cons of releasing things like model weights in a race between “open” and “closed” models.
